sense.name: win
sense.commentary: NOTE: includes 'triumph over', refering to the act of winning NOTE: POS error, noun: Her triumph was uncontested.
sense.examples: Humans haven't triumphed evolutionarily just because of brains. You've managed to triumph over evil and reach your dreams. Had the Series started in Denver, the Rockies would have triumphed.

sense.name: exult
sense.commentary: NOTE: to rejoice in success, not to achieve it; archaic, mostly biblical
sense.examples: Let us rejoice and triumph and give Him the glory.
